title: 禁止玩家使用ess的warp的指令是什么，在线等！
author: Yin_zai

replies.author: wjwrh
replies.txt_content:
Groupmanager:
mangaddp default -essentials.warp

Luckperms:
lp group default permission set essentials.warp false

replies.author: Zengdadawang
replies.txt_content: 如果是gm的话/mangaddp default essentials.warp，如果是pex的话就是pex group default remove essentials.warp

replies.author: xiyanxinnian
replies.txt_content: 其实你可以直接在essentials的配置里(config.yml)中插件命令表中找到这个指令，只要删掉那一行并保存就可以了
